pp2.9:0.3_0: Nine kinds of person should regarded as an individual.
pp2.9:1.1_0: And who is the Blessed One?
pp2.9:1.2_0: It’s when a person understands the truths of the teachings and is well freed in every way. And they attain the meditations on awakening factors.
pp2.9:1.3_0: This is called a person who is a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha.
pp2.9:2.1_0: And what is the person awakened for themselves?
pp2.9:2.2_0: It’s when a person understands the truths of the teachings and is not good. They don’t stay firm, and fails to attain the development of all things.
pp2.9:2.3_0: This is called a personal awakened for themselves.
pp2.9:3.1_0: And what person is freed both ways?
pp2.9:3.2_0: Some person has direct meditative experience of the eight liberations. And, having seen with wisdom, their defilements come to an end.
pp2.9:3.3_0: This person is called freed both ways.
pp2.9:4.1_0: And what person is freed by wisdom?
pp2.9:4.2_0: Or they don’t have direct meditative experience of the eight liberations. And, having seen with wisdom, their defilements have come to an end.
pp2.9:4.3_0: This person is called freed by wisdom.
pp2.9:5.1_0: And what person is a personal witness?
pp2.9:5.2_0: Some person has direct meditative experience of the eight liberations. And, having seen with wisdom, some of their defilements have come to an end.
pp2.9:5.3_0: This person is called a personal witness.
pp2.9:6.1_0: And what person is attained to view?
pp2.9:6.2_0: “It’s someone who truly understands: ‘This is suffering’ ... ‘This is the origin of suffering’ ... ‘This is the cessation of suffering’ ... ‘This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering’.
pp2.9:6.3_0: “This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering”. They have clearly seen and clearly with wisdom, having seen with wisdom, some of their defilements come to an end.
pp2.9:6.4_0: This person is called attained to view.
pp2.9:7.1_0: And what person is freed by faith?
pp2.9:7.2_0: “It’s someone who truly understands: ‘This is suffering’ ... ‘This is the origin of suffering’ ... ‘This is the cessation of suffering’ ... ‘This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering’.
pp2.9:7.3_0: “This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering”. They clearly seen and clearly with wisdom by the Realized One, having seen with wisdom, some of their defilements have come to an end. And they don’t come to an end.
pp2.9:7.4_0: This person is called freed by faith.
pp2.9:8.1_0: And what person is a follower of the teachings?
pp2.9:8.2_0: The faculty of wisdom is outstanding in the realization of the fruit of stream-entry.
pp2.9:8.3_0: This person is called a follower of the teachings.
pp2.9:8.4_0: The person practicing to realize the fruit of stream-entry, but stands by the fruit of once-return.
pp2.9:9.1_0: And what person is a follower by faith?
pp2.9:9.2_0: The faculty of faith is the person who develops the faculty of faith. The faith is the teacher, the outcome of faith.
pp2.9:9.3_0: This person is called a follower by faith.
pp2.9:9.4_0: And a person practicing to realize the fruit of stream-entry. They’re freed by faith.
